text: je loko'e inkara karyo ane allahana margathi rokava lagya ane te pavitra masjidathi pana, jene ame dareka loko mate samana kari didhi che, tyanna rahevasi'o mate pana ane baharathi avanara loko mate pana, je ko'i atyacara kari tyam allahani avajna karavani iccha karase ame tene du:Khadayi yatana cakhadisum
